name: 1private bedroom close to all Boston attractions#4
neighborhood_overview: It’s easy accessible by train, bus, Uber, foot.
description:
This is a beautiful comfortable 4bed townhouse in Boston, South End. You will have your 1 private bedroom with a lock and can share the kitchen, patio, 1 1/2 bathrooms with other guests. There is a queen bed with a twin bed underneath, a good size closet, and a desk you can use with your laptop. Everything is professionally clean after the guests leave. We take pride in cleaning thoroughly all the linens provided and the common shared areas. Tourist info brochures/maps available in the room.

The space
This place is a 10minutes Uber ride to Fenway, Copley Place, Downtown Boston. It is also accessible by transportation, train and buses or by foot. For example it can take up to 20minutes by foot to go to Copley Place.

Guest access
Guests can also share and use the patio for entertaining or grilling anytime.

Other things to note
It’s a quite and safe neighborhood.
